name: Axion ST Uncertainty Reduction (GPR-Refined)
description: Reduction of log10(ST) uncertainty to <= 2 using GPR and geometric invariants.

hypothesis.H0: Geometric invariants cannot reduce log10(ST) uncertainty below 2 orders of magnitude or correlation is non-significant.
hypothesis.H1: GPR-based non-linear modeling reduces log10(ST) uncertainty to <= 2 with R2 >= 0.5.

data_requirements.description: KnotInfo real data (V, Det, Sig, Jones)

test_method: Gaussian Process Regression (GPR) with Matern kernel; uncertainty interval width assessment.
